description: A road is closed by police after a man was spotted on a church rooftop between Leith Walk and Easter Road.
title: Road closed after man on church roof in Edinburgh's Lorne Street
title_page: Road closed after man on church roof in Edinburgh's Lorne Street - BBC News
maintext:
On a quest to get home, a night of fun becomes a dangerous battle...
Celebs welcome Alison Hammond for a sleepover
